website.a: NXP's Model-Based Design Toolbox for S32K1xx Automotive Microprocessors Family Website

demosection.label: These are AUTOSAR CLASSIC Simulink Models that can be run in PIL Simulations directly on S32K1xx MCU. Use these examples to learn how to test, validate and profile AUTOSAL Application Layer directly on NXP HW

These are Generic Simulink Models that can be run on S32K1xx MCU. Use these examples to learn how to test, validate and profile generic embedded applications directly on NXP HW. These models can be easily ported to any of the NXP S32K1xx Evaluation Boards. Read the model info to learn more.

demoitem.label: FreeMASTER - RECORDER and SCOPE over UART
FreeMASTER - RECORDER and SCOPE over CAN
FreeMASTER - Data Visualization based on UART Polling

demosection.label: These are Simulink Models that can run on S32K11x MCUs using standard development boards. Use these examples to learn how to build applications for the S32K116 and S32K118 using various peripherals available.

demoitem.label: Use LED and Push Buttons on S32K11x EVB
FTM Quadrature Decoder Counter and Direction
SPI Master and Slave Ping Pong
S32K116 Download via Boot Loader over UART
S32K118 Download via Boot Loader over UART

demosection.label: Automotive Math and Motor Control Library

These are Simulink Models that can run on S32K14x MCUs using standard development boards. Use these examples to learn how to build applications for the S32K142, S32K144, S32K146 and S32K118 using various peripherals available.

demoitem.label: Use LED and Push Buttons on S32K142 EVB
Use LED and Push Buttons on S32K144 EVB
Use LED and Push Buttons on S32K146 EVB
Use LED and Push Buttons on S32K148 EVB
FTM Quadrature Decoder Counter and Direction
CAN Communications with FreeMASTER Data Visualization over CAN
FlexIO SPI Slave Transfer Non Blocking
SPI Master and Slave Ping Pong
